plugins.name: Swap Dimensions
plugins.description:
Missing the quick frame orientation swap button from the old Figma UI?

This plugin brings that handy feature back—fast and simple!


Swap Dimensions is a lightweight Figma plugin that lets you instantly flip the dimensions of any selected frame — from portrait to landscape or vice versa.


It also updates the Auto Layout direction accordingly, switching between horizontal and vertical when needed.


🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

🪄 Perfect for responsive design, prototyping, or quickly testing layouts in different orientations — with a single click.


No UI, no setup — just select a frame and run the plugin.
136052.tagline: The missing frame orientation toggle from Figma's old UI — back in one click.

plugins.name: StyleX - All-in-one Style management
plugins.description:
**Style Organizer by Squidx** helps you scan, analyze, and clean up your color styles in seconds.


✨ Instantly view every color used on the page

🎨 See usage count, link status, and style name

🔗 Merge unlinked fills into existing styles or auto-create new ones

🌈 Group colors into primary, secondary, shades, and alpha channels

⚡ One-click auto-merge for everything at once


Perfect for design system maintainers, freelancers, and plugin nerds who want clean, linked, and scalable color usage.

accepted.name: Saber Ali
accepted.description: Hi, 👋 I’m Saber Ali. A Product Designer and Visual Developer from Bangladesh. I specialize in UI/UX Design, Responsive Web Design, and Visual Development

plugins.tagline: Quickly view, merge & organize all color styles in one place.

plugins.name: Remote Variable Replacer
plugins.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
plugins.tagline: Replace those pesky remote variables!

135284.name: Remote Variable Replacer
135284.description:
Sometimes Figma variables aren’t coming from inside the house. While this plugin has a likely very tiny amount of potential users, if I can help anybody save any time trying to locate and replace variables that are orphans or “remote”, then this has been worth it.


For whatever reason, variables in Figma can be attached to other libraries, older files, archived files even. This can cause major headaches when editing local variables and components don’t seem to respond to the edits.


I fully expect this plugin to have a limited lifespan as Figma themselves will likely improve variable handling during copy/pastes, schema renaming or other scenarios where variables can be orphaned.


In the meantime, I got you.
135284.release_notes:
Improved the dropdowns for numerical variables to only show local variables whose base value match the remote variable base value. This should make the plugin easy to navigate if a user has hundreds of variables.

Removed beta language; Included network access for tailwind for easy stying and unpkg.com for React. This should fix the blank screen of death. Rookie mistake!

Also updated the data security details to let users know the network access is only for static items.

plugins.name: colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer
plugins.description:
Zendeeps | colCheck - Color Usage Analyzer helps you understand the color distribution in your Figma frames. Select any frame, and the plugin shows:

•How many unique colors are used

•Which colors appear the most

•The percentage breakdown of each color


It scans fills, strokes, and effects to give you a quick overview of your color usage—perfect for design audits, cleanup, and maintaining consistency.


No setup required. Just open the plugin, click a frame, and see the stats.

accepted.name: Ruhul
accepted.description: Senior UX/UI Designer and Webflow Developer

plugins.tagline: Visualize your color usage at a glance.

plugins.name: Image Compressor FREE
plugins.description:
A small but mighty Figma plugin that helps you compress and replace images right inside your designs.

Simply select one or more image layers — or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout — this tool does one job well and doesn’t get in your way.
plugins.tagline: image compression, export, lightweight, jpeg, optimization, size, nested images, size, png, jpg

134694.name: Image Compressor FREE
134694.description:

Simply select one or more image layers — or let the plugin dive deep into nested frames and groups.

You can control the compression level, and the plugin will convert images to optimized JPEGs on the fly.

Perfect for preparing files for lightweight PDF exports or sharing compact mockups with clients and developers.

Minimal, clean, and respectful of your layout — this tool does one job well and doesn’t get in your way.
134694.release_notes:
Version 1.0.0 – Initial Release
Features:

🔹 Compress and replace image fills with optimized JPEGs

🔹 Adjustable compression quality (10–100)

🔹 Option to search nested images inside frames and groups

🔹 Multilingual interface (9 languages supported)

🔹 Clear visual report: before / after size & savings

🔹 Result compression bar with color feedback

plugins.name: Promptus
plugins.description:
Promptus is a free Figma plugin that turns text or images into high-quality AI image prompts—all in just seconds, without leaving Figma.


⸻


Available tools

•Text-to-Prompt – type a brief and receive a detailed prompt

•Image-to-Prompt – upload an image and extract the underlying prompt

•One-Click Copy – copy the ready-to-use prompt wherever you need


⸻


Set up your Google Gemini API key in Promptus:


Open Promptus inside Figma.

Click the gear icon (Settings) in the top-right corner of the plugin panel.

Go to Google AI Studio.

Click “Sign in to Google AI Studio” and authenticate with your Google account.

In the top header, click the “Get API Key” button.

When prompted, click “Create API key”.

In the project pop-up, enter a project name (or select an existing one) and confirm.


Thank you for choosing Promptus! 🤩

👉 If you have any questions or suggestions, let us know — your feedback makes all the difference.
plugins.tagline: Instantly generate detailed AI image prompts in Figma

plugins.name: Radical: Gradient Background Generator
plugins.description: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds. Gradients are vector-based, scalable to any resolution. Control colors, background, blur amount, etc. The last Gradient Generator you'll ever need!
plugins.tagline: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds with customizable colors & blend modes.

134179.name: Radical: Gradient Background Generator
134179.description: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds. Gradients are vector-based, scalable to any resolution. Control colors, background, blur amount, etc. The last Gradient Generator you'll ever need!
134179.release_notes: Now, frames will generate at 1920x1080 regardless of zoom level; when user is zoomed way out, the blur amount wasn't sufficient. Now when a frame is generated it will always be at the set blur level - then the user can scale to any size they prefer.
134179.tagline: Generate beautiful gradient backgrounds with customizable colors & blend modes.

plugins.name: Disable "Clip content"
plugins.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
plugins.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

133693.name: Disable "Clip content"
133693.description:
A Figma plugin that disables the “Clip content” property on supported layers – either across the entire file or just the selected ones. Originally built for internal use at DevExpress, it helps reduce noise in exported SVGs by removing unnecessary <clipPath> wrappers and keeping the markup clean.


Repo: https://github.com/alexfi1in/figma-disable-clip-content
133693.release_notes:
– Improved logging: the path to each modified clipsContent node is now printed in a structured, readable format with icons.
– Skipped clipsContent updates for INSTANCE nodes to avoid errors.
133693.tagline: A simple plugin to turn off “Clip content” on selected layers or throughout the entire file.

plugins.name: Pager
plugins.description:
Design-Ready File Templates in Seconds

Stop rebuilding your file structure every time.

Pager helps you spin up clean, structured Figma files with reusable templates built from your own component libraries or ours.


Whether you're starting a new product flow, setting up for research, or handing off to devs, Pager gives you a smart starting point so you can focus on design, not setup.


With Pager, you can:

Import full-page layouts from your published library components


  1. Use default templates for wireframes, UI, research, and more
  2. Create dynamic templates with text, boolean, and variant controls (Pro)
  3. Build faster with consistent, scalable structure


No setup? No problem.

Start from scratch or pick a default template.

Upgrade to Pager Pro anytime to sync your own library and automate your team’s workflow.


📚 View Documentation

🧩 Explore Example Templates
plugins.tagline: Go from blank canvas to design-ready in seconds.

plugins.name: EasySpotlight
plugins.description: EasySpotlight makes it simple to highlight key areas you want to focus on. Just turn your original image into a frame, add a new frame over the area you want to spotlight, select two frames, and click the "Create Spotlight" button. The plugin will dim the background and create a custom highlight—perfect for presentations, tutorials, or showcasing design details!
plugins.tagline: Spotlight key areas, dim the rest.

133188.name: EasySpotlight

Just turn your original image into a frame, add a new frame over the area you want to spotlight, select two frames, and click the "Create Spotlight" button. The plugin will dim the background and create a custom highlight—perfect for presentations, tutorials, or showcasing design details!
133188.tagline: Spotlight key areas, dim the rest.

plugins.name: SaveFrame - Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.
plugins.description:
SaveFrame — Figma Frames, Re imagined!


Tired of Figma’s default frame window? SaveFrame is your modern visual command center for everything frames.

Custom frames, Organize, preview, customize, delete, and share—like never before.


Whether you're documenting designs, building moodboards, or curating visual systems, SaveFrame gives you full creative control. It's what Figma frames should feel like.


✨ Why designers love SaveFrame:


🔍 Instant Frame Previews

  1. No more clicking around. See all your frames at a glance in a clean, scrollable UI.

🧩 Drag & Drop Organization

  1. Sort, group, and build collections effortlessly. Your canvas, your logic.

🧹 Smart Deletion

  1. Clear out what you don’t need—instantly. Delete single frames or full sets with confidence.

📐 Save All the Details

  1. Dimensions, effects, layout, constraints—SaveFrame remembers the stuff that matters.

🎨 Reusable Frame Presets

  1. Create your own frame styles and apply them in one click. Keep your design patterns consistent.

🚀 Seamless Sharing

  1. Export and import frame collections in seconds.
  2. Perfect for sharing with teammates or individuals—no friction, no confusion.

⭐ Favorite Key Frames

  1. Highlight your best work and access it instantly when it counts.

🌗 Light & Dark Mode

  1. A workspace that adapts to your vibe, day or night.



🛠 Built for designers who:

  1. Want more control than Figma gives out of the box
  2. Create and manage multiple frames daily
  3. Build moodboards, docs, and design systems
  4. Hate clutter and love visual clarity
  5. Need a fast way to share organized frames with collaborators


In short:

We took the idea of Figma frames and made it flexible, collaborative, and creator-first.

SaveFrame isn’t just a tool—it’s a better way to work with frames.
plugins.tagline: Figma Frames, Reimagined — Save, Share, and Manage Custom Frames with Ease.

plugins.name: Sustainalyzer
plugins.description:
Sustainalyzer helps you evaluate the ecological impact of your Figma designs. It detects design elements that conflict with the Web Sustainability Guidelines (WSG) and scientific research on digital sustainability.


The plugin checks for the following sustainability issues:


  1. Avoid videos, particularly autoplay or background media
  2. Minimize image use, especially large or excessive images
  3. Optimize images for size, format, and scaling
  4. Avoid third-party services (e.g. embeds, maps, social widgets)
  5. Avoid decorative elements that add visual weight without purpose
  6. Limit font variants to reduce font file size
  7. Prefer system fonts over custom fonts
  8. Reduce complexity by limiting the number of elements
  9. Disable animation autoplay to reduce processor load
  10. Consider older devices, avoiding effects that degrade performance or compatibility
  11. Use a design system to support reuse and reduce redundancy
  12. Choose energy-efficient colors, especially for large UI areas


Each guideline is tagged with an impact level—high, medium, or low—indicating its potential contribution to emissions. You can filter the results by impact level to focus on the most critical issues.


To use Sustainalyzer, simply select the elements you want to analyze and run the plugin.
plugins.tagline: Check your designs for sustainability issues based on the Web Sustainability Guidelines.

plugins.name: SliceView
plugins.description: Depths creates a stacked x-ray view of any layer in Figma. It separates and reveals each layer in depth order, making it easier to understand complex groupings, overlapping elements, and hierarchy at a glance.
plugins.tagline: Peek inside your layers. Visualize depth and stacking in your Figma selection.

129691.name: SliceView
129691.description: Depths creates a stacked x-ray view of any layer in Figma. It separates and reveals each layer in depth order, making it easier to understand complex groupings, overlapping elements, and hierarchy at a glance.
129691.tagline: Peek inside your layers. Visualize depth and stacking in your Figma selection.

plugins.name: Randomize
plugins.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

129638.name: Randomize
129638.description:
How it Works:


Select Text Layers: Choose one or more text layers on your Figma canvas that you want to modify.


Open Randomize: Run the Randomize plugin.


Enter Your Items: In the input field, type or paste the different text strings you want to use, making sure each item is separated by a comma (,). For example: John Doe, Jane Smith, Alex Johnson, Maria Garcia


Click Randomize: Press the "Randomize" button.


See the Magic: The plugin will instantly replace the content of each selected text layer with a randomly selected item from the list you provided.
129638.tagline: Effortlessly populate selected text layers with random content from your custom list.

plugins.name: Skeema
plugins.description:
What is Skeema?

Skeema is a Figma plugin that integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. It allows frontend developers and designers to access API schemas for specific design components, making it easier to align designs with backend structures and speed up the development process.


How does Skeema work?

It connects your Figma designs to the relevant API documentation. By clicking on a design element, you can instantly view the associated endpoint documentation, eliminating the need to search through long API docs.


Who is Skeema for?

This plugin is designed for frontend and backend developers, and teams who work with API-driven applications. It helps bridge the gap between design and development, making UI-based API integration and collaboration smoother and more efficient.


What are the key benefits of using Skeema?

  1. 🚀 Faster API integration: No more switching between tools. Get API docs directly inside Figma.
  2. 🎯 Better accuracy: Ensure your design components match the API structures, reducing development errors.
  3. 👩‍💻 Streamlined collaboration: Designers and developers stay aligned, minimizing back-and-forth communication.


Do I need technical skills to use Skeema?

While Skeema is built with developers in mind, it's intuitive enough for designers to use as well. Its UI is designed to seamlessly integrate into your existing Figma workflow, making it accessible for anyone involved in the design and development process.


What APIs does Skeema support?

Skeema is designed to work with OpenAPI (Swagger) specifications, but it can support a wide range of RESTful APIs. As long as your API has proper documentation, Skeema can link it to your Figma designs.


Is Skeema free?

Skeema offers both a free version with basic features and a premium version with advanced features such as team collaboration, extended API support, and priority access to updates.


Can I use Skeema with my team?

Yes! Skeema is built for collaborative teams. You can easily share API-linked designs with your development team, ensuring that everyone stays on the same page and works with the latest API documentation.
plugins.tagline: Skeema integrates API documentation directly into your design workspace. Simply click to view docs.

plugins.name: Offgrid.fm
plugins.description:
Offgrid.fm is a lightweight Figma plugin that quietly monitors your design canvas and alerts you when someone is viewing your work without interacting. Whether you're collaborating on sensitive projects or just want more visibility into your workspace and helps you stay in control.


Key Features:

  1. Real-time detection of inactive observers
  2. Instantly identifies who's viewing your designs
  3. Helps protect your creative privacy and intellectual property
  4. Runs silently in the background without disrupting your workflow


Currently supports the Figma Web App only. *


Ideal for designers handling confidential work, remote teams, and creatives who value situational awareness in collaborative environments.
plugins.tagline: You've got eyes on you 👀

plugins.name: Preview Card Creator
plugins.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  1. Got summary or overview pages? This is useful for deeper linking into specific pages without having to be familiar with the file.
  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
plugins.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

125915.name: Preview Card Creator
125915.description:
Overview

Create a preview card from selected frames. The card contains images generated from the frames and a link back to the original Figma file allowing for easy navigation.


Why use this?

  2. Got a centralized file that contains the whole application? Stop the file from getting large by replacing full flows with a preview card that deep links to individual Figma files.
125915.tagline: Create preview cards for summary or overview pages

plugins.name: Layer Name Selector
plugins.description:
🔍 Finding the right layers in your design just got easier!


Layer Name Selector lets you define a scope (either the entire page or the selected area), choose specific layer types, and automatically select all matching layers with a single click.


Features:

1️⃣ Define scope: Work on the current page or only within selected elements.

2️⃣ Filter by layer type: Choose from Text, Instance, Component, Frame, Group and Rectangle.

3️⃣ One-click selection: Hit the "Select" button and let the plugin do the work!


Perfect for organizing large files, speeding up your workflow, and making precise edits in seconds. Try it out now! 🚀

plugins.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concerns—helping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time! 🚀
plugins.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive 🚀

128248.name: Smart Accessibility Checker
128248.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and inclusive with the Smart Accessibility Checker! This Figma plugin scans for contrast issues, touch target sizes, font readability, and color-blindness concerns—helping you create user-friendly designs effortlessly. Get instant AI suggested insights and basic fixes to improve accessibility in real-time! 🚀
128248.release_notes:
🔧 Version 3.0 – Now with Auto-Fix!
We’re back with a powerful update! 🎉

🆕 What’s New in v3.0
✨ Auto-Fix for Font Size
Text nodes that fall below accessibility standards are automatically updated to a minimum readable size of 12px.

✨ Auto-Fix for Touch Targets
Interactive elements smaller than 48x48 px are now automatically resized to meet accessibility guidelines for tap targets.

These improvements help you stay WCAG-compliant with just one click. Perfect for speeding up your design workflow while ensuring usability for all.
128248.tagline: Design with Clarity: Smarter, Accessible, Inclusive 🚀

plugins.description:
Your Personal Design Mentor for Growth, Confidence, and Impact

Little Bro is the ultimate tool for designers who want to elevate their craft and make a real impact. Whether you're a junior designer, freelancer, or aspiring creative, Little Bro provides the mentorship and tools you need to thrive in your design journey.


  1. Instant Feedback on UX and Usability: Get real-time insights into your designs with usability simulations that help you identify pain points and improve user satisfaction.
  2. Accessibility Standards Made Simple: Ensure your designs are inclusive and meet accessibility standards effortlessly, making your work usable for everyone.
  3. Overcome Creative Blocks: Stay inspired and productive with strategies to spark creativity and keep your projects moving forward.
  4. Refine Your Presentation Skills: Learn to articulate your design decisions with clarity and confidence, helping you win over clients, teams, and stakeholders.
  5. Continuous Skill Development: With guidance refined by senior, staff, and director-level UI/UX and product designers, Little Bro helps you grow into the confident, skilled designer you aspire to be.


Little Bro is more than just a tool—it's your partner in mastering the art of UI/UX. From instant feedback to accessibility and usability insights, Little Bro is here to help you create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and impactful.


Join a community of designers transforming their careers with Little Bro and unlock your full potential today.

plugins.name: DATVM
plugins.description:
DATVM makes it simple to inject realistic and varied data directly into your Figma designs, saving you time and keeping your mockups authentic.


100+ Built-in Datasets

Choose from a wide range of pre-populated categories.


Customizable Lists

Create and manage your own custom lists to perfectly match your project's specific needs.


Sort & Randomize

Sort data alphabetically, by length, or randomize for unique content every time.


Number Formatting

Format numbers with precision. Control decimal places, separators, currency symbols, and percentage variations.


Date Formatting

Easily format dates with customizable separators and order.


Bookmarks

Save your favorite lists for quick and easy access.


How it Works

  1. Select the text layers you want to populate.
  2. Open DATVM.
  3. Choose a data category from the available lists or select a custom list.
  4. Customize formatting options.
  5. Click to populate the selected layers with data.
plugins.tagline: Finest Data Populator

plugins.name: BlendAI
plugins.description:
BlendAI seamlessly integrates with Figma to let you generate high-quality images from text prompts or combine up to three reference images in a single click. It’s perfect for product mockups, hero banners, packshots, concept art, backgrounds, or quick visual inspiration—without ever leaving your Figma file.


Key Features:

• Simple prompt → image

Type a natural-language description and instantly receive a crisp, AI-rendered result.

• Multi-reference blending

Upload up to three reference images (for example: a product shot, a texture, and a background) and instruct BlendAI to place, style, or combine them.

Example: “Place @IMG_1 in front of @IMG_2 with the lighting mood of @IMG_3.”

• Six aspect-ratio presets

1:1 (Square), 16:9 (Landscape), 9:16 (Portrait), 4:3 (Classic), 3:4 (Portrait), 21:9 (Ultrawide)

• Instant one-click generation

No manual exports or workarounds—everything happens directly in Figma’s interface.

• Credit-based system

Includes a free 10-image starter pack. Easily top up credits from the “Get More” menu.

• History & quick re-use

View, revisit, and re-generate past images directly within the plugin.


BlendAI was built for designers who need on-the-fly visuals—whether it’s a quick hero image for a mockup, a polished packshot for a product page, or a fully blended scene combining multiple photo references. Try it free, then unlock larger credit packs for heavy usage.
plugins.tagline: AI image generation & multi-reference blending inside Figma for hero banners, mockups or backgrounds

plugins.name: QuickData
plugins.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

Select the layers you want to update


Click the “Sync” button


🖊️ Text layers: name & content will update


🧱 Other layers: only name updates


🙌 Support Me

If you found this plugin helpful, consider supporting me:

👉 https://jdip19.github.io/support-jdip.html


💬 Have Feedback or Ideas?

📧 Contact me: ujaydip9@gmail.com


🔗 Follow me on LinkedIn for UI/UX & plugin design updates:

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
plugins.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

137348.name: QuickData
137348.description:
Easily sync your Figma layers with data from a public Google Sheet. Perfect for batch renaming or inserting text into layers based on column headers.


✅ 1. Prepare Your Google Sheet

Set it to public:

File → Share → Anyone with the link


Make sure the first row contains column headers


For best results, freeze the header row


⚙️ 2. In the Plugin

Paste your Google Sheet URL


Preview your data in a table


Use the refresh button to reload updated data


🧩 3. Setup Layers

Name your layers using: #ColumnName

e.g., For a "Name" column → #Name


Spaces & special characters are auto-removed


🔁 4. Sync Your Data

linkedin.com/in/jaydip-upadhyay-32b231176
137348.release_notes:
## Version 2.0.0 (June 2025)

### Major Changes
- **Streamlined Data Syncing**
  - Simplified the core functionality to focus on direct Google Sheets integration
  - Improved data normalization for sheets with or without frozen headers
  - Enhanced error handling for invalid URLs and data formats

### UI Improvements
- **Tea Cup Animation**
  - Added animated steam effects with three particles
  - Implemented hover animations for the "Buy me tea" link
  - Refined positioning and styling of the tea cup SVG
  - Modified steam animation timing and positions

- **Instructions Modal**
  - Reorganized the "How to use" modal content for better clarity
  - Added clearer sections for:
    - Sheet preparation
    - Plugin usage
    - Layer syncing
  - Included tips about header rows and preview functionality

### Technical Improvements
- **Code Optimization**
  - Removed unused interfaces and functions for better maintainability
  - Streamlined the core data syncing logic
  - Improved error message handling
  - Enhanced logging for better debugging

### User Experience
- **Better Feedback**
  - Added clear success messages with layer count details
  - Improved error notifications with specific failure reasons
  - Added loading states during data fetch operations

### Documentation
- **Plugin Description**
  - Updated cover image text: "Instantly sync your Google Sheets data with Figma layers for seamless content updates"
  - Enhanced usage instructions and examples
137348.tagline: Auto-fill & rename text layers from Google Sheets

plugins.name: AI Alt Text Generator
plugins.description:
# Figma Plugin: AI Alt Text Generator


AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成するFigmaプラグインです。


---


## 機能概要

- **Gemini（Google）またはOpenAI Vision API**を利用し、画像内容に応じたaltテキストを自動生成

- **日本語・英語のUI/プロンプト切り替え**（画面右上のボタンで即時反映）

- **APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存**

- **複数候補（1～5件）を一度に生成し、編集・選択可能**

- **キーワード指定**で生成内容をカスタマイズ

- **画像プレビュー**とステータス表示

- **エラー時の明確なフィードバック**


---


## セットアップ

1. プラグインをFigmaにインストールします。

2. [Google Gemini APIキー](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) または [OpenAI APIキー](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) を取得します。

3. プラグインを起動し、設定タブでAPIキーを入力・保存してください。


---


## 使い方

1. **Figmaキャンバス上で画像ノードを選択**

2. 「Altテキスト生成」タブで「画像を解析」ボタンをクリック

3. 画像プレビューとサイズが表示されます

4. 必要に応じてキーワード（日本語は読点「、」区切り、英語はカンマ区切り）や候補数を指定

5. 「代替テキストを生成する」ボタンをクリック

6. 候補リストが表示され、各候補は編集可能

7. 必要に応じて内容をコピーし、プロジェクトの代替テキスト欄等に貼り付けてご利用ください


---


## 言語切り替え

- 画面右上の「日本語 | English」ボタンでUI・プロンプト・説明文が即座に切り替わります。


---


## APIキーについて

- GeminiまたはOpenAIのAPIキーが必要です（どちらか一方でも可。両方入力時はGeminiが優先されます）

- APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存されます

- 無料枠や利用制限については各サービスの公式情報をご確認ください


---


## 注意事項

- このプラグインは選択画像の内容を外部AIサービス（Google Gemini/OpenAI）に送信します。プライバシーや機密情報の取り扱いにご注意ください。

- 生成されるaltテキストはAIによる自動生成のため、最終的な内容はご自身でご確認ください。


---


## English


### Overview

AI Alt Text Generator is a Figma plugin that uses Google Gemini or OpenAI Vision APIs to automatically generate accessible alt text for selected images in your Figma file.


### Features

- Generate alt text using **Gemini (Google) or OpenAI Vision API**

- **UI and prompt language switch (Japanese/English)** with a single button

- **API keys are securely saved** using Figma's clientStorage

- **Generate multiple candidates (1–5) at once, editable and selectable**

- **Keyword input** to influence the generated alt text

- **Image preview** and status display

- **Clear error feedback**


### Setup

1. Install the plugin in Figma

2. Obtain a [Google Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) or an [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. Launch the plugin and enter/save your API key(s) in the Settings tab


### How to Use

1. **Select an image node on the Figma canvas**

2. In the "Generate Alt Text" tab, click the "Analyze Image" button

3. The image preview and size will be displayed

4. Optionally, enter keywords (comma-separated for English, "、" for Japanese) and select the number of candidates

5. Click the "Generate Alt Text" button

6. Candidate alt texts will be displayed, each editable

7. Copy the desired alt text and paste it into Figma's alt text field or elsewhere as needed


### Language Switch

- Use the "日本語 | English" button at the top right to instantly switch all UI and prompts between Japanese and English


### About API Keys

- Either Gemini or OpenAI API key is required (if both are entered, Gemini is prioritized)

- API keys are securely saved in Figma's clientStorage

- Please check each service's official documentation for free tier and usage limits


### Notes

- This plugin sends the selected image to external AI services (Google Gemini/OpenAI) for analysis. Please be mindful of privacy and confidential information.

- The generated alt text is AI-generated; please review and edit as needed before use.
plugins.tagline: AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成します。

132361.name: AI Alt Text Generator
132361.description:
# Figma Plugin: AI Alt Text Generator


AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成するFigmaプラグインです。


---


## 機能概要

- **Gemini（Google）またはOpenAI Vision API**を利用し、画像内容に応じたaltテキストを自動生成

- **日本語・英語のUI/プロンプト切り替え**（画面右上のボタンで即時反映）

- **APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存**

- **複数候補（1～5件）を一度に生成し、編集・選択可能**

- **キーワード指定**で生成内容をカスタマイズ

- **画像プレビュー**とステータス表示

- **エラー時の明確なフィードバック**


---


## セットアップ

1. プラグインをFigmaにインストールします。

2. [Google Gemini APIキー](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) または [OpenAI APIキー](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) を取得します。

3. プラグインを起動し、設定タブでAPIキーを入力・保存してください。


---


## 使い方

1. **Figmaキャンバス上で画像ノードを選択**

2. 「Altテキスト生成」タブで「画像を解析」ボタンをクリック

3. 画像プレビューとサイズが表示されます

4. 必要に応じてキーワード（日本語は読点「、」区切り、英語はカンマ区切り）や候補数を指定

5. 「代替テキストを生成する」ボタンをクリック

6. 候補リストが表示され、各候補は編集可能

7. 必要に応じて内容をコピーし、プロジェクトの代替テキスト欄等に貼り付けてご利用ください


---


## 言語切り替え

- 画面右上の「日本語 | English」ボタンでUI・プロンプト・説明文が即座に切り替わります。


---


## APIキーについて

- GeminiまたはOpenAIのAPIキーが必要です（どちらか一方でも可。両方入力時はGeminiが優先されます）

- APIキーはFigmaのclientStorageに安全に保存されます

- 無料枠や利用制限については各サービスの公式情報をご確認ください


---


## 注意事項

- このプラグインは選択画像の内容を外部AIサービス（Google Gemini/OpenAI）に送信します。プライバシーや機密情報の取り扱いにご注意ください。

- 生成されるaltテキストはAIによる自動生成のため、最終的な内容はご自身でご確認ください。


---


## English


### Overview

AI Alt Text Generator is a Figma plugin that uses Google Gemini or OpenAI Vision APIs to automatically generate accessible alt text for selected images in your Figma file.


### Features

- Generate alt text using **Gemini (Google) or OpenAI Vision API**

- **UI and prompt language switch (Japanese/English)** with a single button

- **API keys are securely saved** using Figma's clientStorage

- **Generate multiple candidates (1–5) at once, editable and selectable**

- **Keyword input** to influence the generated alt text

- **Image preview** and status display

- **Clear error feedback**


### Setup

1. Install the plugin in Figma

2. Obtain a [Google Gemini API key](https://aistudio.google.com/apikey) or an [OpenAI API key](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys)

3. Launch the plugin and enter/save your API key(s) in the Settings tab


### How to Use

1. **Select an image node on the Figma canvas**

2. In the "Generate Alt Text" tab, click the "Analyze Image" button

3. The image preview and size will be displayed

4. Optionally, enter keywords (comma-separated for English, "、" for Japanese) and select the number of candidates

5. Click the "Generate Alt Text" button

6. Candidate alt texts will be displayed, each editable

7. Copy the desired alt text and paste it into Figma's alt text field or elsewhere as needed


### Language Switch

- Use the "日本語 | English" button at the top right to instantly switch all UI and prompts between Japanese and English


### About API Keys

- Either Gemini or OpenAI API key is required (if both are entered, Gemini is prioritized)

- API keys are securely saved in Figma's clientStorage

- Please check each service's official documentation for free tier and usage limits


### Notes

- This plugin sends the selected image to external AI services (Google Gemini/OpenAI) for analysis. Please be mindful of privacy and confidential information.

- The generated alt text is AI-generated; please review and edit as needed before use.
132361.tagline: AI Alt Text Generatorは、Figma上で選択した画像に対してGoogle GeminiまたはOpenAIのAIを使い、アクセシブルな代替テキスト（altテキスト）を自動生成します。

plugins.name: Variant Randomizer
plugins.description:
Tired of manually clicking through component variants one by one just to create visual variety in your mockups? Variant Randomizer is here to help! This simple yet powerful Figma plugin lets you instantly randomize the variants applied to multiple selected components or instances that have more than one variant option.


How it Works:

Select multiple elements (components/instances) on your canvas.

Run the [Plugin Name] plugin.

Done! The plugin automatically assigns a random variant to each selected element that has multiple variants available. Elements with only one variant or no variants will be ignored.


Why use Variant Randomizer?

Save Valuable Time: Stop the tedious process of manually changing variants across many elements.

Create Realistic Mockups: Quickly add natural variation to lists, grids, user avatars, button states, icons, and more.

Boost Productivity: Perfect for working with design systems and large sets of components.

Simple & Fast: One-click operation after selection.

Works on Selection: Target only the elements you need to change.



You can help me mantain this plugin by Buying me a coffee!
plugins.tagline: nstantly randomize component variants across your selection.

plugins.name: 今日の日付
plugins.description:
今日の日付をテキストプロパティに入力するだけのプラグインです。


  1. インスタンスを選択してください。
  2. プラグインを立ち上げてください。
  3. プロパティを選択します。
  4. 「今日の日付を入力」押下。
  5. インスタンスを選び直した時は、更新ボタンを押してください。


This plugin just inserts today's date into a text property.
plugins.tagline: 今日の日付をテキストプロパティに入力するだけのプラグイン

plugins.name: Refine Selection
plugins.description:
Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma


Transform your selection workflow with this powerful tool that helps you select and deselect layers with precision. Perfect for designers who work with complex designs and need quick access to specific layer types.


Key Features:

• One-Click Selection: Instantly select all layers of a specific type within your current selection

• Alt+Click to Deselect: Hold Alt (or Option) to deselect layers instead of selecting them

• Smart Layer Detection: Automatically identifies and filters:

- Text layers

- All shapes

- Primitives (stars, polygons, lines, rectangles, ellipses)

- Paths

- Lines

- Image layers

- Frame layers

- Components

- Instances


Workflow Benefits:

• Save Time: No more manual selection of multiple layers

• Reduce Errors: Precise selection of specific layer types

• Smart UI: Buttons automatically disable when no matching layers are found

• Intuitive Design: Clean interface with visual feedback


Perfect For:

Designers working with complex layouts

Teams managing large design systems

Anyone who needs to quickly select specific layer types

Designers who frequently work with nested components


💡 Pro Tip: Hold Alt (or Option) while clicking to deselect layers instead of selecting them!


Note: Free version includes rate limiting of 50 selection per minute. Subscribe to remove limitations and support future development.
plugins.tagline: Refine Selection: Smart Layer Filtering for Figma

plugins.name: ColorGen AI
plugins.description: ColorGen AI is a powerful tool for generating custom color palettes. Users can input colors using hex codes, adjust HSL values, or use the color picker tool to pick the color from your design. The platform simplifies color selection, making it easy to explore and refine shades for design projects. Click on any color to copy its hex code effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Unlock the Magic of Colors – Create, Explore, and Design with Confidence!

plugins.name: Export Children 1Click
plugins.description:
Export Children 1Click helps you instantly export all Frame layers inside any container (Section, Frame, or Group) as individual image files.


⚡ Features:

•Export all child frames with one click

•Works with Sections, Frames, Groups

•No UI, no configuration needed — just select and run

•Automatically names each image by frame name

•Extremely fast and memory-safe


💡 Ideal for handoff, documentation, or asset slicing.


Created with ❤️ by Giang Nguyen
plugins.tagline: Export all frames inside any container in one click.

plugins.name: Cool Names Generator
plugins.description: Do you want to generate names for your mockups? This plugin helps you generation random character names from various categories including video game characters, superheroes, and famous movie characters.
plugins.tagline: Instantly replace generic text by movie character names to your Figma designs.
